name: Earth Release: Tearing Earth Turning Palm
sourcePage: Earth Release: Tearing Earth Turning Palm

raw.wikitext:
{{Infobox/Jutsu |ref=''[[Tō no Sho]]'', page 262 |image=Doton Retsudo Tenshō.png |kanji=土遁・裂土転掌 |unnamed jutsu=No |romaji=Doton: Retsudo Tenshō |literal english=Earth Release: Tearing Earth Turning Palm |english tv=Earth Style: Earthquake Slam
Earth Style: Rupturing Earth Palm |jutsu rank=C |jutsu classification=Ninjutsu |jutsu type=Earth Release |jutsu class type=Offensive |jutsu range=Short, Mid, Long |users=Sumashi, Fudō~anime, Victor~anime, Kakashi Hatake~game |hand signs=Boar, Ox, Technique specific seal |debut manga=244 |boruto=No |debut anime=120 |debut shippuden=Yes |boruto anime=No |game debut=Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4 |jutsu media=Anime, Manga, Game }} This is among the more basic techniques taught in [[Iwagakure]]. By placing the palm of their hand on the ground, the user breaks up and shifts the local [[earth]]. The better the user's [[chakra]] control, the greater the amount of earth that will be broken up. Despite its relative simplicity, this technique is effective enough to remain a viable option in combat, especially when performed by multiple users at the same time. == See Also == * ''[[Earth Release: Devouring Earth]]'' == References == [[es:Elemento Tierra: División de la Palma de Tierra]] [[fr:Doton - Étreinte Tectonique]] [[pl:Doton: Retsudo Tenshō]] [[ru:Стихия Земли: Разрывающая Землю Поворотная Ладонь]]
